name: Welcome to Paradise
description:
Welcome to Paradise is an experience. Experience amazing moments on the Tropical Island in the middle of the ocean.

This wonderful place is full of sun, hot sand, beautiful views and nice music.

During the day explore the island.
In the evening you can sit on the sand and relax in the sunset.
At night, look at the sky and admire the stars.

This experience was created to relax.
Comfortably sit in your chair and feel like on a paradise island.

Game designed for virtual reality with full support of roomscale.
